name: Conta Simples
headline: All-in-one financial platform for latam Startups and SMBs.
description: Conta Simples is an all-in-one financial platform that combines checking account, expense management software and corporate cards, for Latam companies.

founders.name: Rodrigo Tognini, Founder
founders.description: I'm from Brazil, graduated in Business Administration at Insper, and before starting Conta Simples, I worked in companies such as Stone, one of biggest payment processors in Brazil, and also in a strategic consulting company, called Integration.

founders.name: Ricardo Gottschalk, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder @ Conta Simples
Sales Manager @ Creditas
Business Development Manager @ Stone Pagamentos
Sales Rep @ Oralce

founders.name: Fernando Santos, Founder
founders.description: I am Bsc Computer Science where I won the 1st place in the National Scientific Initiation Congress. I am also have a Master Degree in Project Management at FIAP, where I was finalist in the Startup One program with more than 1,000 registrations. I have more than 16 years of experience in software development, having worked at Accenture and Capgemini, building core solutions for Brazilian Banks (Bradesco and Santander) and also a team leader at Cielo (Acquirer company in Brazil).

## Gestão de despesas corporativas**em um só lugar**
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/64c0211c12da34b563594d66_celular%2Bcartao_HackerAds.png)
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/63f77c1cf0553c36e3b7e9bb_conta-img.webp)
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/64c81acc4207539022b21606_tela_relatorios.webp)
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/65131eb95c3ab12b434c1630_tela_economiadetempo.webp)
### [Liberdade no dia a diaEmita cartões para distribuir pelas áreas e pague assinaturas de softwares, anúncios, materiais de escritório, despesas em viagens e o que mais precisar.](https://contasimples.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [**Autonomia para a equipe** Crie perfis de usuários para os colaboradores e personalize suas permissões na plataforma. Cada gestor pode ser responsável pelos cartões de seu departamento.](https://contasimples.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [**Controle sobre as despesas** Acesse gráficos de despesas por cartões, responsáveis ou centros de custos em poucos cliques e acompanhe todas as transações via app ou Internet Banking.](https://contasimples.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)### [**Mais tempo para focar no seu negócio** Otimize seu tempo fazendo a gestão de despesas na mesma plataforma em que cria cartões, paga boletos e realiza transferências bancárias.](https://contasimples.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/63f77f64305db152fba50e1c_cartao_conta-simples_limite.webp)
### Cartões físicos ou virtuais
Emita múltiplos cartões para distribuir pelas áreas ou usar como preferir. Emitidos sob a bandeira Visa e aceitos internacionalmente.
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/63fa7c96b9bb10cfa2fad2dd_img-tab-2%20\(1\).webp)
### Controle sobre as despesas
Receba notificações e acompanhe todas as transações via app ou Internet Banking. Garanta a visibilidade sobre o caixa com gráficos de despesas e separação por centros de custos.
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/63fa7cad0e95344045aa0ecd_img-tab-3.webp)
### Potência e economia de tempo
Abra uma conta PJ de forma rápida, defina o limite de gastos dos seus cartões e acompanhe toda gestão em um só lugar.
![Página de Cartões do aplicativo da Conta Simples sendo exibido em um celular](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bafaff2f682a6725578209/63fa7d004e9a8c394871226e_img-tab-4.webp)
### Autonomia para o time
Crie perfis de usuários para os colaboradores e personalize suas permissões na plataforma. Cada gestor pode ser responsável pelos cartões de sua área.

generated_description:
**Conta Simples Overview**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from São Paulo, Brazil, Conta Simples is making waves as a formidable player in the fintech space focused on Latin American startups and small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs). With an innovative all-in-one financial platform, it seamlessly combines a checking account, expense management software, and corporate cards tailored to meet the unique needs of Latin American companies. 

As a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S20, Conta Simples has garnered significant traction in its mission to simplify financial management. The company employs a strong team of 130 dedicated individuals, operating under the leadership of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell.

### What They Offer

At its core, Conta Simples aims to empower businesses with tools designed to streamline their financial operations. Here’s a snapshot of what users can expect:

1. **Corporate Cards**: Businesses can issue physical or virtual cards for team use, which are accepted internationally under the Visa network.
2. **Expense Management**: A powerful platform that enables companies to manage expenses, track spending, and generate insightful reports on financial performance.
3. **Integrative Solutions**: Solutions are specifically crafted for various business sectors, including:
   - **Startups**: Assistance with expense tracking unique to startup environments.
   - **E-commerce**: Tools to manage inventory costs and logistics efficiently.
   - **Consultancies and Construction**: Tailored services focusing on project-based spending.

### Subscription Model

Conta Simples operates on a subscription model, offering its comprehensive set of features for a competitive fee of R$49.90/month. This includes unlimited PIX transactions, bill payments, and access to customizable corporate cards. 

The service is built for flexibility, allowing businesses to adapt their financial management as they scale. If companies spend less than R$5000 per month on cards, they can maintain a simple monthly fee, further promoting economic efficiency and visibility over financial activities.

### Conclusion

With a clear focus on redefining how businesses approach their financial operations in Latin America, Conta Simples is definitely a company to watch. Their blend of cutting-edge technology with a thorough understanding of the regional market positions them as a pivotal ally for startups and SMBs eager to enhance their financial management practices.

For further exploration of their offerings, you can visit their website at [Conta Simples](https://contasimples.com/).
